entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Drizzle or freezing drizzle ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming southwest 20 before morning. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
